headline: Schwab Announces Redemption of All Outstanding Depositary Shares Representing Interests in Its 5.375% Fixed-Rate Reset Non-Cumulative Perpetual Preferred Stock, Series G
summary: WESTLAKE, Texas, May 13, 2025--On June 1, 2025, Schwab will redeem all of the outstanding shares of its 5.375% Fixed-Rate Reset Non-Cumulative Perpetual Preferred Stock, Series G
